Author: Pythagoras
Quote: Leave the roads; take the trails.

Author: Rembrandt
Quote: Choose only one master - nature.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: I took a walk in the woods and came out taller than the trees.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Adopt the pace of nature. Her secret is patience.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Nature is pleased with simplicity. And nature is no dummy.

Author: John Muir
Quote: Going to the mountains is like going home.

Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.

Author: Hans Christian Andersen
Quote: Just living is not enough. One must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.

Author: Laura Ingalls Wilder
Quote: If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere.

Author: Vincent van Gogh
Quote: ...and then, I have nature and art and poetry, and if that is not enough, what is enough?

Author: Aristotle
Quote: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.

Author: Aldo Leopold
Quote: I am glad I will not be young in a future without wilderness.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Live in each season as it passes; breathe the air, drink the drink, taste the fruit, and resign yourself to the influence of the earth.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.

Author: Rachel Carson
Quote: Those who contemplate the beauty of the earth find reserves of strength that will endure as long as life lasts.

Author: Alice Walker
Quote: In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect. Trees can be contorted, bent in weird ways, and they're still beautiful.

Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote: Not just beautiful, though - the stars are like the trees in the forest, alive and breathing. And they're watching me.

Author: Elisabeth KÃ¼bler-Ross
Quote: Should you shield the canyons from the windstorms you would never see the true beauty of their carvings.

Author: Claude Monet
Quote: My wish is to stay always like this, living quietly in a corner of nature.

Author: Francis Bacon
Quote: Nature to be commanded must be obeyed.

Author: Richard Phillip Feynman
Quote: I think Nature's imagination is so much greater than man's, she's never gonna let us relax!

Author: Syliva Plath
Quote: I felt my lungs inflate with the onrush of scenery - air, mountains, trees, people. I thought, 'This is what it is to be happy.'

Author: Carl Sagan
Quote: Preserve and cherish the pale blue dot, the only home we've ever known.

Author: John Muir
Quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.

Author: Theodore Roethke
Quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.

Author: Gerard De Nerval
Quote: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.

Author: Alex Trebek
Quote: If you can't be in awe of Mother Nature, there's something wrong with you.

Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.

Author: Leigh Hunt
Quote: Colors are the smiles of nature.

Author: Robin Williams
Quote: Spring is nature's way of saying, 'Let's party!'

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: The earth laughs in flowers.

Author: Jules Renard
Quote: On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.

Author: Henri Matisse
Quote: There are always flowers for those who want to see them.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.

Author: Theodore Roethke
Quote: Deep in their roots, all flowers keep the light.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.

Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote: If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere.

Author: George Santayana
Quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.

Author: L. Wolfe Gilbert
Quote: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.

Author: Katrina Mayer
Quote: Time spent amongst trees is never wasted time.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: If we surrendered to earth's intelligence, we could rise up rooted like trees.
